text: 10:6-8 Godɨn Araziba 30:12-14Kar Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn akar otevir mam, a gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn tuavimɨn Godɨn damazimɨn deraziba, a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia uan navir averiabar kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam markɨ, ‘Tina Godɨn Nguibamɨn ghuavanangam?’ ” (Akar kam kamakɨn, nɨ Krais e bagh izighirɨsɨ, nɨ mangɨva an azangam?)
